TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CorrelationHandle extends System.Activities.Handle

summary.span: Ordnet Aktivitäten zusammen in einer Korrelation zu, indem ein bestimmter freigegebener oder ein flüchtiger Kontext im Workflow dargestellt wird.

span.span: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared or transient context in the workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) bietet vier Arten der Korrelation: [Inhaltsbasiert](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Anforderung-Antwort](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [permanenter Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), und [Kontextaustausch](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request-Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Durable Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), and [Context Exchange](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md). Weitere Informationen zu Korrelationen finden Sie unter [Übersicht über die Korrelation](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), die bestimmte Korrelationstypen erwähnten und den korrelationsbeispielen unter dem [Services [WF-Beispiele] ](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) Knoten der WF-Beispiele.For more information about correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) node of the WF samples. Die Common Language Runtime verwendet die für die Korrelation, sofern vorhanden, andernfalls die **CorrelatesWith** -Eigenschaft der Messagingaktivität verwendet werden.The runtime uses the for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used. Wenn keines der beiden Elemente vorhanden ist, wird das von bereitgestellte Ambient-Handle oder der Workflowdienst verwendet.If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by or the workflow service is used. ## Examples Das folgende Beispiel veranschaulicht das Festlegen des einer -Aktivität.The following example shows how to set the on a activity. [!code-csharp[ImplicitExplicitCorrelation#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/implicitexplicitcorrelation/cs/service/pharmacyservice.cs#0)]
